General.Name: Ningbo Yongxin Optics Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Yongxin Optics Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells precision optical instruments and components in China. It offers optical microscopes and optical components used for various applications in optical and electronic products, such as bar-code scanners, motion optics, automotive driving, high-end cameras, HD projection, teaching, life sciences, semiconductors, etc. The company offers its products under the NOVEL, JIANGNAN, and NEXCOPE brands. It also exports its products to approximately 80 countries. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Yongxin Optical Instrument Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Yongxin Optics Co.,Ltd in 2000. Ningbo Yongxin Optics Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Ningbo, China.
